title: How to Surrender in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.title: Check the time.
steps.content: Check the time. You'll have to play the game a bit before you surrender. You must wait for 6 minutes to pass for most games, and Brawl matches 4 minutes. In the case someone is AFK in a Ranked Game, an early surrender vote can be added to make the game invalid (within 3 minutes).

steps.title: Click on the settings button.
steps.content: Click on the settings button. There will be a button that says "Surrender." Click on it.

steps.title: Have the other players decide.
steps.content: Have the other players decide. You will need 4 players to agree on this, or it will not pass. They will decide on the situation, including their KDA and turret damage.

steps.title: Avoid being persistent on the surrender button.
steps.content: Avoid being persistent on the surrender button. Again, comeback wins can occur in the game with your might, so don't always pull the white flag from the system right away! Additionally, a quote will show if someone opts to reject surrendering the game. It may be best to hold on tight until it is over!
